answers.answer: Hi i had high fluid with my daughter it wasnt extreamly high they couldnt find a cause for mine i know they made me redo the sugar test to make sure i did develope diabetes but everything came back normal and they also did blood work too to check for certain things but i forget what they tested for
Thank you for the reply. Im hoping its nothing! Did u have a hard labor? She said it could make labor more difficult bc something to do w the contractions..?
i had to have a csection because i had one with my son.I dont know if it would make labor more difficult or not

I have had tons of fluid with all my pregnancies but more so with my last. They couldnt find the reason for but told me it was more than likely that I had GD. I failed the one hour but passed the two hour so as far as im consered I didnt have GD. They also told me my baby was HUGE! 9lbs 12 ozs at my 37 week u/s. she was born a few days later weighing 7 lbs 6 ozs, lol! Given the amount of fluid you have can throw off the accuartcy of their weight est. I had normal vag deliverys with all 4 of my babies. My last was the longest. My water broke in the early AM and I had her around noon:) She was also the only baby my waters broke with................could have been because I just had sooooo much, lol!

Lol well i had pisted on here earlier this wk bc my last was eleven days early and weighed 8.12 but my first was 7.6 so it could gi rither way lol! I hope my water breaks on its own it did with my youngest and it did w my first but i was induced w her so i dunno if that counts lol;)
Sorry for all the typos im using my ipod n the buttons are so small

question: I had my ultrasound today and im 33 wk 3 days and baby is measuring 5.15 # so he'll probably be a big boy! My question is she said i had a lot of amniotic fluid not scary a lot but definately more than normal. She is giving my results to my midwife so she can decide if she wants to do more testing. I dont have gestational diabetes whicj she said could be a cause, did any of you have a lot of fluid and find out why? She wasnt very detailed in possible reasons just ssid it could be nothing or it could be something to do w his swallowing or infection. My younhest was born w a serious infection and they never found out for sure why said it was possible i had a slow leak but they were nevet certain. Anyways would love some input!! Thanxx- rachel
title: Update on u/s today.. Question!
